## ğŸ“‹ QUICK REFERENCE PATTERNS

### By Problem Type
```
Database Insertion Fails:
  â†’ #typeql-collision-prevention + #dependency-ordering
  
Missing Dependencies:
  â†’ #conditional-enrichment + #error-preservation
  
Custom Fields Not Detected:
  â†’ #dynamic-reference-detection + #anti-pattern

  â†’ #collision-testing + #conditional-testing
```

### By Implementation Phase
```
Planning:     #core-pattern + #anti-pattern
Coding:       #implementation + #performance  
Testing:      #testing + #edge-case
Debugging:    #debugging + #error-preservation
```

## ğŸ¯ CONTEXTUAL LOADING TRIGGERS

### High-Priority Combinations
```
typeql + variable     â†’ Load: typeql-integration + MASTER-INDEX
stix + processing     â†’ Load: enhancement-summary + cleaning-pipeline  
test + collision      â†’ Load: testing-patterns + typeql-integration
error + handling      â†’ Load: python-patterns + MASTER-INDEX
```

### Smart Context Detection
